user_input:
Please create hourly Electricity demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios.
Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. 
No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications. No PLEXOS database access is required; operate on external/generated files only.

function_args.user_input: Generate hourly electricity demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 with scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE for years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050. Split nodes as requested. Do not access any PLEXOS database; work with external/generated files only. Produce outputs in an intermediate structure ready for TST export.

tasks.description: Generate hourly electricity demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 using scenarios NT, NT_HE, NT_LE for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050, and split the nodes as requested.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', determine appropriate scenario/year combinations and apply node splitting while generating hourly profiles without using a PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly demand profiles to TST format for the TYNDP study team.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', package the previously generated hourly demand profiles into TST workbooks suitable for the TYNDP study team.
